Summary: on the 21'st of sep 2008 i saw a extreamly bright light come directly overhead i could tell it was round but it was to bright to determine what it really looked like.
divs: Sighting Detailsi was in my front yard takeing in the evening calm and clear sky i was looking up to see the faint few stars and air planes going by, by the way i've been liveing here for the last 30 years in the area and i've seen all kind of air traffic, from ultralights to the concord to the spaceshuttle re entry as i was checking out the skies my hose faces the south the objeck cought my eyes in the southwest i thought it was a star till it started getting brighter then i assumed airplane but all other planes in the area had stobes flashing even the ones that were far i could see the strobes when the object got even closer i ran inside called my wife and kids to come see this that way they could wittness the objecton the way back out i grabed my bonoculars wich are 10*50 power we all looked at it through them yet i could'nt compare it to any other air borne object that i've ever seen it seemed like it was higher than the planes comeing in for a landing yet lower than the one's approching the metroplex the object when over head didnot make a sound yet was traveling at what seem like the speed of a fighter jet at about 10 thousand feet plus or minus acouple hundred feet the object was so bright i still had a hard time makeing out what it looked like it was sphere to disk type with what seem like a space between top and bottom it traveld in a direct line twards the north east tere was no breeze that evening after it went over head i went inside to call a friend that lives to the north of the airport to sere if he could see any thing but he was a littl;e to late to see it because as it moved over head i realized it was trveling a lot faster than what i figured because it seem like it only took it a couple of minutes to disapear to the north east a couple of days later i mentioned it to my mom and she told me that she seen on a hispanic channel were thay mentioned that several people in the fort worth area called in with a report of an objectin the skys thats it thank you very much for letting me submit this sighting.
